definition: Abby or Abi (name, sometimes short for Abigail)
abbr. for Afghanistan 阿富汗[A1 fu4 han4]
prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]
Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)

pinyin: A1 bi3 xi1 ni2 ya4 ren2
A1 bi3 xi1 ni2 ya4 Guan1 hua4

sentences.english: The cases were reported in different health districts of the capital, Abidjan.
sentences.chinese: 這兩例分別是由首都阿比讓不同衛生地區報告的。
那是個阿比西尼亞姑娘。

sentences.english: At Abilene, the cattle were put on trains and carried to Chicago.
sentences.chinese: 在阿比林，這些牛被運上火車送往芝加哥。

sentences.english: Abigail Breslin plays Anna, the younger sister.
sentences.chinese: 阿比蓋爾佈雷斯林次安娜的妹妹。

sentences.english: The battle for Abidjan will be decisive.
sentences.chinese: 阿比讓的戰鬥將是決定性的。

sentences.english: China welcomes the upcoming visit by Parliamentary Presiding Officer Speaker of the Parliament Roger Abiut to China in the second half of this year.
sentences.chinese: 我們歡迎阿比尤特議長今年下半年訪問中國。

sentences.english: Abbie has volunteered at United Planet.
sentences.chinese: 阿比是聯合星球的志願者。

sentences.english: The resolution also bans the use of heavy weapons around the city of Abidjan.
sentences.chinese: 該決議還禁止在阿比讓周邊地區使用重武器。

sentences.english: Since the beginning of this year, the organization in Abyan province frequent attacks.
sentences.chinese: 自今年年初以來，該組織在阿比揚省內頻繁發動襲擊。

sentences.english: This week, music from banjo-playing singer Abigail Washburn.
sentences.chinese: 本週，音樂班卓琴扮演歌手阿比蓋爾沃什。

sentences.english: Abdiel decides not to join Satan's army and returns to God.
sentences.chinese: 阿比迪決定不加入撒旦的陣營重返上帝的身邊。

sentences.english: There were explosions and gunfire throughout Friday.
sentences.chinese: 週五一整天，阿比讓都瀰漫着爆炸聲和槍炮聲。

sentences.english: She calls the soldiers, who attacked her and her fellow students, barbarians.
sentences.chinese: 阿比巴把那些攻擊她和其他學生的士兵稱爲野蠻人。

sentences.english: Earlier, he imposed an immediate overnight curfew on Abidjan.
sentences.chinese: 此前，他下令立即在阿比讓實施夜間宵禁。

sentences.english: So too was Hiram Abiff, architect of the Temple of Solomon.
sentences.chinese: 所羅門廟宇的建築師海勒姆阿比夫也是如此。
那是個阿比西尼亞少女。

definition: Kara, city in northern Togo 多哥[Duo1 ge1]/Cara, Karla etc (name)
Pali, language of Theravad Pali canon/Barry (name)/Gareth Barry (1981-), English footballer
Ur (Sumerian city c. 4500 BC in modern Iraq)
to display/to spread out/to distribute/old spelling of 盧布|卢布[lu2 bu4], ruble
Barth or Barthes (name)/Roland Barthes (1915-1980), French critic and semiotician
